(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (ADVP (DT all))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (VP (VBN seen)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Aston) (POS 's))
          (NN writeup))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNS newspapers))
            (NP (JJ last) (NNP Monday))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(seen-5, You-1)
advmod(seen-5, all-2)
aux(seen-5, have-3)
advmod(seen-5, probably-4)
root(ROOT-0, seen-5)
poss(writeup-8, Aston-6)
possessive(Aston-6, 's-7)
dobj(seen-5, writeup-8)
prep(seen-5, on-9)
det(newspapers-11, the-10)
pobj(on-9, newspapers-11)
amod(Monday-13, last-12)
dep(newspapers-11, Monday-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP He))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN known)
        (PP (IN as)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN guy))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ offers)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NN premium) (NNS steaks))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (DT a)
                        (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))
                        (NN price)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(known-3, He-1)
auxpass(known-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, known-3)
prep(known-3, as-4)
det(guy-6, the-5)
pobj(as-4, guy-6)
nsubj(offers-8, who-7)
rcmod(guy-6, offers-8)
nn(steaks-10, premium-9)
dobj(offers-8, steaks-10)
prep(steaks-10, for-11)
det(price-15, a-12)
advmod(good-14, really-13)
amod(price-15, good-14)
pobj(for-11, price-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Well))
    (SBAR (RB now)
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (NP
            (NP (NN news))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (NN steak) (NNS lovers)))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)
advmod(have-4, now-2)
nsubj(have-4, I-3)
dep(Well-1, have-4)
dobj(have-4, news-5)
prep(news-5, for-6)
nn(lovers-8, steak-7)
pobj(for-6, lovers-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNS Astons))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB now))
      (VP (VBG selling)
        (NP (NNP A5) (NNP grade) (NNP Japanese) (NNP Kagoshima) (NNP Wagyu) (NN beef) (NN steak))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(selling-4, Astons-1)
aux(selling-4, is-2)
advmod(selling-4, now-3)
root(ROOT-0, selling-4)
nn(steak-11, A5-5)
nn(steak-11, grade-6)
nn(steak-11, Japanese-7)
nn(steak-11, Kagoshima-8)
nn(steak-11, Wagyu-9)
nn(steak-11, beef-10)
dobj(selling-4, steak-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD ate)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT this))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Tokyo))
                (CC and)
                (NP (PRP$ my) (NN steak)))))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (ADJP (JJ $))))))))


nsubj(ate-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, ate-2)
nsubj($-10, this-3)
prep(this-3, in-4)
pobj(in-4, Tokyo-5)
cc(Tokyo-5, and-6)
poss(steak-8, my-7)
conj(Tokyo-5, steak-8)
cop($-10, was-9)
ccomp(ate-2, $-10)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (CD 195))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ 270g) (NN steak)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, 195-1)
prep(195-1, for-2)
det(steak-5, a-3)
amod(steak-5, 270g-4)
pobj(for-2, steak-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP (PRP me)))
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (NN something))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBD had)
              (VP (VBN been)
                (VP (VBG looking)
                  (ADVP (RB forward))
                  (PP (TO to)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG eating)
                        (NP (PDT all) (PRP$ my) (NN life))))))))))))
    (. .)))


prep(something-5, For-1)
pobj(For-1, me-2)
nsubj(something-5, it-3)
cop(something-5, was-4)
root(ROOT-0, something-5)
nsubj(looking-9, I-6)
aux(looking-9, had-7)
aux(looking-9, been-8)
rcmod(something-5, looking-9)
advmod(looking-9, forward-10)
prep(looking-9, to-11)
pcomp(to-11, eating-12)
predet(life-15, all-13)
poss(life-15, my-14)
dobj(eating-12, life-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ Japanese) (NN grading) (NN system)))
    (NP (NNP A5))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ top) (NN grade))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ means)
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (DT the) (NN beef))
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (ADJP (RB very) (RB very) (JJ marbled))))))))))
    (. .)))


prep(grade-10, In-1)
det(system-5, the-2)
amod(system-5, Japanese-3)
nn(system-5, grading-4)
pobj(In-1, system-5)
nsubj(grade-10, A5-6)
cop(grade-10, is-7)
det(grade-10, the-8)
amod(grade-10, top-9)
root(ROOT-0, grade-10)
nsubj(means-12, which-11)
rcmod(grade-10, means-12)
det(beef-14, the-13)
nsubj(marbled-18, beef-14)
cop(marbled-18, is-15)
advmod(marbled-18, very-16)
advmod(marbled-18, very-17)
ccomp(means-12, marbled-18)
